pageContext.course_type_long_description: Gear up for a full-day LEGO® camp packed with hands-on and minds-on STEM fun! In this challenge based program, build projects inspired by cool machines close to home, such as Gear Cars, Gondolas, Merry-Go-Rounds, and Scissor Lifts. Then build Motorized Minecarts, Ghasts, and Creepers from the Minecraft universe! Engineer and Craft innovative solutions in this new full-day themed engineering camp for LEGO® fanatics!
pageContext.course_type_name: STEM Challenge + Minecraft w/LEGO® Materials: FULL DAY
